title: 352 S Lafayette St Apt 402 - Denver - Easy Parking and Central!
app_fee: $30 per adult, covers background and credit check
posting_body: This 4th level condo comes with a great view of Downtown Denver on your very own balcony.
The kitchen has recently been updated.
You will find yourself just a couple blocks from Wash Park and a 5 minute drive from Cherry Creek Mall.
The property is perfectly located to have easy access to I-25.
INCLUDED UTILITIES: Gas, water, sewer, trash, and snow removal.
Electric and any other utilities not listed above.
KITCHEN APPLIANCES INCLUDED: Refrigerator, stove, dishwasher, microwave, and garbage disposal.
Baseboard heaters and window AC unit.
PARKING: 1 assigned space in underground garage #9.
RESTRICTIONS: Per the HOA, pets are not allowed.
Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.
**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 1 week of the property's listed availability date.
LEASE TERM: Initial lease to end April through June of 2023 with 12-month extensions possible at that time.
Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.
